ygData.subject: The Test Begins.

Subject: The Test Begins.
Date: Fri, 28 Jul 2000 08:51:19 PDT
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>


* BrightBlade stopped, watching the grasslands rise from the spaces between 
the trees, holding Gangon's fading spark to her chest-plate.
She had to get into the Maximal base soon, in and out. Her fellow Predacons 
were expecting the information in which she was to gather, and she knew that 
they weren't going to wait forever.
With a heavy sigh she then looked up at Perndabot.*

" Here is where you stop...and my task begins."

* She then held up the stasis ball to her face and looked at Gangon's spark, 
knowing that she had to do something if he was going to servive through all 
this.*

" Looks like I have to take you with me after all. The Matrix knows I don't 
want you to die."

* So with that she kneeled where she had stood, opening her leg compartment 
and taking out a few salect items. One of them being an energy relay cord 
that she would use to keep Gangon alive.
Carefully removing a small plate on her hip she inserted one end of the 
cord, then carefully inserted the other into a slot on the other side of the 
ball.
The cord was attached to a main finction system in her hip, relaying all 
that her body had towards the spark in the ball. Basically, it was an 
umbilical cord.
The energy in her mech fluid would be fed into Gangon's spark through the 
cord, as well as the oxygen it needed and so on.
She hoped that it would buy him some more time until she could get back to 
base and get him into a new body.
Then placing the stasis ball into another compartment in her leg she looked 
over the few things in which she needed to infultrate the Maximal base.
While she sorted through a few things she spoke to the spark in her leg.*

" If there's anything else you know I can do to make sure you like, you tell 
me. Alright? And you shouldn't bounce around in there, there's enough 
padding."

* Then sure that she had everything she needed she got to her feet and 
collected her things. Looking up at Perndabot she smiled.*

" I'll be quick but make sure that you're ready to slag some foolish 
Maximals if they come after me. Alright?"

* Then with that she treansformed into best mode and opened a cloaked 
channel to the Predacon base. Then personalizing the transmission to 
Rampage.*

" Rampage, this is BrightBlade. Keep all base defences on full, ready for 
any attack from anybot. With times as they are now we can't be too careful. 
Be ready for the information transfer soon. Any other messages you relay to 
me from here on must be coded and recoded, I can't rist being descovered by 
the Maximals. BrightBlade out."

* And with that she deactivated her com-link, looking out across the field 
to the massive shapd of the Cybertronien Fire.
With a sigh she placed the cloaking device on her furry shoulder and 
activated it. Hotwired to make sure that it could not even be detected by a 
cloak scann she moved out into the gresslands, keeping low and well hidden 
in the long yellow stalks. Now the test began!*
